name: Rysen (itch)
description:
Rysen is an old school 2d vertical shooter (shoot 'em up style game) for Windows. The free demo version is located at the bottom of this page.

Features:
  • 7 stages per 1 round.
  • DirectInput & XInput controller are supported.
  • No bullet-hell
  • No bomb, no combo, no buzz, no gems, no medals and any other bonus items, and no difficult scoring system.
  • Simple bonus system just to annihilate the enemy formation.
  • Designed to be able to concentrate on the two factors of avoiding bullets and firing shots.
  • 3 difficulties.
  • Fine configuration changes are possible.
  • ogg format original sound track is included.
Game Systems:

The main keys used in the game are as follows.

  • Directional control (Analog stick or D-pad)
  • Weapon1
  • Weapon2 (Not use while deploying shield)
  • Changing Speed
  • Insert credits

For explanation of the game system & how to play,  please refer to the link below.
Official site (en) / Official site (ja)

OST:

This game contains OST contents. These files are included in the PRODUCT version, NOT included in the DEMO version. The file format is ogg, then you can play with the ogg format compatible player. For most musics, recommended to play with "loop playback" function. You can also use these files as BGM in this game.

DEMO version:

This game has free demo version. Run the demo version to check if you can run the game correctly before purchasing. Demo version contains 3 stages.

Differences between Steam version & itch.io version:
  • Steam version corresponds to Steam’s online leader board and achievements, possible to save config & data files to the Steam cloud.
  • itch.io version is DRM free, and you can play the game completely offline.
